Build a mobile app called **Single Boy Studio Hub** for iOS and Android.

Purpose:
This app is a central hub that lets users explore and play all my products (websites, web games, and tools) directly inside the app.

App Requirements:

1. **Home Screen**
   - Create a grid or card-style layout.
   - Each card contains:
       • Product icon/image
       • Product name
       • Short description
   - Example items to include (use placeholders for now):
       • Speeding Finger (https://speedingfinger.com)
       • Medieval Trading Game Website
       • Anime Chronicles Info Page
       • Virus War Game Page
       • My Portfolio Website
   - I should be able to easily add, edit, or remove products.

2. **Open Product → Load Inside App**
   - When user taps a product:
       → Open a new page with a **WebView**.
       → Load the given URL inside the WebView.
       → Allow full-screen mode for games.
       → Enable JavaScript.
       → Support Unity WebGL/HTML5 games when possible.
       → Allow landscape orientation for game pages.
       → Include an in-app Back button.

3. **Navigation**
   - Modern and clean top bar with title.
   - Smooth page transitions.

4. **Design & Theme**
   - Minimalistic, modern, App Store-quality design.
   - Dark theme preferred:
       • Dark background
       • Soft rounded cards
       • White text
       • Smooth shadows

5. **Extra Features**
   - Add a simple “News / Updates” page (static text for now).
   - Add a “Contact & Socials” page linking to:
       • Instagram (Single Boy Studio)
       • Discord
       • Website link

6. **Project Setup**
   - Generate with React Native + Expo (default from Natively).
   - Structure code clearly:
       • screens/
       • components/
       • data/products.json (list of product links)
   - Make it easy for me to later update icons, product list, and URLs.

7. **Final Goal**
   - The app should feel like:
       **A professional hub launcher for all my software, games, and websites, loaded directly inside the app using WebView.**

Okay, I understand. You want a mobile app called "Single Boy Studio Hub" for iOS and Android, built with React Native and Expo, that acts as a central hub for your various products (websites, web games, and tools). The app should load these products inside WebViews, have a dark theme, and be easy to update. Here's a plan to get started:

**Features for the First Version:**

-   **Home Screen:** A grid or card-based layout displaying your products with icons, names, and descriptions. This will be the main entry point to your app.
-   **Product WebView:** When a user taps on a product, a new page will open with a WebView loading the corresponding URL. This WebView will support full-screen mode, JavaScript, Unity WebGL/HTML5 games, landscape orientation, and include a back button.
-   **Navigation:** A top bar with a title and smooth page transitions to provide a modern user experience.

**Design Elements:**

-   **Colors:**
    -   Background: `#121212` (Dark Grey)
    -   Text: `#FFFFFF` (White)
    -   TextSecondary: `#B0B0B0` (Light Grey)
    -   Primary: `#BB86FC` (Purple)
    -   Secondary: `#03DAC6` (Teal)
    -   Accent: `#BB86FC` (Purple)
    -   Card: `#1E1E1E` (Darker Grey)
    -   Highlight: `#292929` (Slightly Lighter Dark Grey)
-   **Typography:** Use a modern, clean font like "System" for a native feel.

**Plan:**

1.  **Project Setup:** Use the existing React Native + Expo project structure.
2.  **File Structure:**
    *   Create a `data/products.json` file to store the list of product links, icons, names, and descriptions.
    *   Create `screens/HomeScreen.tsx` for the home screen.
    *   Create `screens/ProductScreen.tsx` for the WebView product page.
    *   Create `screens/NewsScreen.tsx` for the news page.
    *   Create `screens/ContactScreen.tsx` for the contact and socials page.
    *   Create `components/ProductCard.tsx` for the product cards on the home screen.
3.  **Implement `HomeScreen.tsx`:**
    *   Read product data from `data/products.json`.
    *   Display products in a grid or card layout using `ProductCard.tsx`.
4.  **Implement `ProductScreen.tsx`:**
    *   Use the `WebView` component from `react-native-webview` to load the product URL.
    *   Implement full-screen mode, JavaScript support, and landscape orientation.
    *   Add a back button.
5.  **Implement `NewsScreen.tsx`:**
    *   Add static text for the news/updates page.
6.  **Implement `ContactScreen.tsx`:**
    *   Add links to Instagram, Discord, and your website.
7.  **Navigation:**
    *   Use `react-navigation` to create a top bar and smooth page transitions.
8.  **Theme:**
    *   Implement the dark theme using the specified colors.
    *   Add soft rounded corners to cards and smooth shadows.
9.  **Update `app/(tabs)/(home)/index.tsx`:**
    *   Remove the modalDemos array from app/(tabs)/(home)/index.tsx.

## 🎉 What's Been Built

### **Core Features:**

1. **Home Screen** (`app/(tabs)/(home)/index.tsx`)
   - Beautiful card-based grid layout displaying all your products
   - Each card shows an icon (emoji), product name, and description
   - Smooth animations when tapping cards
   - Easy to customize by editing `data/products.json`

2. **Product WebView Screen** (`app/(tabs)/product.tsx`)
   - Full-screen WebView that loads your websites/games
   - JavaScript enabled for Unity WebGL and HTML5 games
   - Full-screen video support
   - Landscape orientation support
   - Custom back button with smooth navigation
   - Loading indicator while content loads

3. **News & Updates Screen** (`app/(tabs)/news.tsx`)
   - Static news page with beautiful card layout
   - Easy to add/edit news items
   - Shows date, title, and content for each update

4. **Contact & Socials Screen** (`app/(tabs)/contact.tsx`)
   - Links to Instagram, Discord, and Website
   - Tappable cards that open external links
   - About section describing Single Boy Studio
   - Support information

### **Design & Theme:**
- ✅ Dark theme with the exact colors you specified:
  - Background: `#121212`
  - Text: `#FFFFFF`
  - Primary: `#BB86FC` (Purple)
  - Secondary: `#03DAC6` (Teal)
  - Card: `#1E1E1E`
- ✅ Soft rounded corners (16px radius)
- ✅ Smooth shadows and elevation
- ✅ Modern, minimalistic, App Store-quality design

### **Navigation:**
- ✅ Native iOS tabs using `expo-router/unstable-native-tabs`
- ✅ Floating tab bar for Android/Web
- ✅ Smooth page transitions
- ✅ Three main tabs: Home, News, Contact
- ✅ Product screen opens as a modal with back button

### **File Structure:**
```
data/
  └── products.json          # Easy to edit product list
components/
  └── ProductCard.tsx        # Reusable product card component
app/(tabs)/
  ├── (home)/
  │   ├── index.tsx         # Home screen (Android/Web)
  │   └── index.ios.tsx     # Home screen (iOS)
  ├── news.tsx              # News screen (Android/Web)
  ├── news.ios.tsx          # News screen (iOS)
  ├── contact.tsx           # Contact screen (Android/Web)
  ├── contact.ios.tsx       # Contact screen (iOS)
  ├── product.tsx           # WebView screen (Android/Web)
  ├── product.ios.tsx       # WebView screen (iOS)
  ├── _layout.tsx           # Tab layout (Android/Web)
  └── _layout.ios.tsx       # Tab layout (iOS)
```

## 📝 How to Customize

### **Adding/Editing Products:**
Simply edit `data/products.json`:
```json
{
  "id": "6",
  "name": "Your New Product",
  "description": "Description here",
  "url": "https://yourwebsite.com",
  "icon": "🎮"
}
```

### **Updating News:**
Edit the `newsItems` array in `app/(tabs)/news.tsx` and `app/(tabs)/news.ios.tsx`

### **Changing Social Links:**
Edit the `socialLinks` array in `app/(tabs)/contact.tsx` and `app/(tabs)/contact.ios.tsx`

### **Customizing Colors:**
All colors are centralized in `styles/commonStyles.ts`

## 🚀 Features Implemented

- ✅ WebView with full JavaScript support
- ✅ Unity WebGL/HTML5 game support
- ✅ Full-screen video capability
- ✅ Landscape orientation support
- ✅ Loading indicators
- ✅ Smooth animations
- ✅ Platform-specific code (iOS vs Android)
- ✅ External link handling
- ✅ Dark theme throughout
- ✅ Professional, modern UI

The app is now ready to use! You can tap on any product card to open it in a WebView, navigate between tabs, check news updates, and access your social links. All the placeholder URLs in `products.json` can be easily replaced with your actual product URLs! 🎨✨
